name: Emphasis Point
alt: Diagram of a hand pointing with the index finger.

name: Open Hand
alt: Diagram of an open hand, palm facing forward.

name: Balance
alt: Diagram of two hands held out, palms up and level.

name: Chin Rub
alt: Diagram of a hand rubbing the chin.

name: Attentive Rest
alt: Diagram of a hand resting calmly.

name: Thumbs Up
alt: Diagram of a hand giving a thumbs up.

name: Peace Sign
alt: Diagram of a hand making a peace sign.

name: Prayer Hands
alt: Diagram of two hands pressed together in prayer.
